attributes.action: Apple Inc to use Spy Planes to 3D Map Cities
attributes.additional_details:
Apple Inc. is expected to announce a new "Maps" programme this week for its platforms allowing users to view aerial images of our houses/gardens etc. down to a resolution of 10cm. Google has already invaded our privacy somewhat with it's Street View product.

Do we want yet another unrequested image of our house/garden to be available for all to see around the world?

This government must seek immediate assurances from Apple Inc. and explain to the UK population as to how our privacy will be protected when these images are made generally available.
